identity.name: Eric NICOLAS
identity.title: Solution Architect
identity.summary:
Critical thinker above all else, I am a detail-oriented and creative problem solver.
I believe in the separation of concerns and orchestrating reusable, flexible services. I have the ability to multitask and work on a couple of projects at once.
I can hold deadlines, too.

experience.title: Solution Architect & Product Owner
experience.abstract: Responsible for the design of the entirety of the services that make up our enterprise solution.

experience.company: Gaspard Monge Institute, University of Paris
experience.title: Project Manager
